verses.roman:
dāmodara-svarūpa-milane parama ānanda
śikhi-māhiti-milana, rāya bhavānanda

synonyms: dāmodara-svarūpa—Svarūpa Dāmodara; milane—in meeting; parama—great; ānanda—pleasure; śikhi-māhiti—of the name Śikhi Māhiti; milana—meeting; rāya bhavānanda—Bhavānanda, the father of Rāmānanda Rāya.
translation: Eventually there was a meeting with Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī, and the Lord became very greatly pleased. Then there was a meeting with Śikhi Māhiti and with Bhavānanda Rāya, the father of Rāmānanda Rāya.
